name: Monday Night Primetime Jamtime
description:
Prepare for digital musical athletics of the future!

You and a friend try to get the ball into the goal, but with a trick: you each must lock in your moves on the beat, and watch you moves play out several beats later.

Use your wits and giant lasers to get past your opponent and bring back the championship for your hometown!

Developed as part of Train Jam 2017, all on a train on from Chicago to San Francisco.
